savers

Interface IDataSaver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataSaver_Dense, DataSaver_DenseJava, DataSaver_DenseTFRecord, DataSaver_Null, DataSaver_Sparse, DataSaver_StageSelected

    public interface IDataSaver

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String generateFileName(String prefix, String className)
      Generate a filename.
      IDataSaver getCopy()
      Get a fresh copy of this saver with the same settings.
      void reportGameEnding(Node endNode)
      Get the final game state for this run.
      void reportGameInitialization(State initialState)
      Report initial state.
      void reportStageEnding(Node rootNode, List<Node> targetNodes)
      Called when the end of a TreeStage is reached.
      void reportTimestep(Action action, GameLoader game)
      Report intermediate nodes as they are being run.
      void setSaveInterval(int numGames)
      Set the number of games to collect in between saves.
      void setSavePath(String fileLoc)
      Set where the files are saved.

    • Method Detail

      • reportGameInitialization

        void reportGameInitialization(State initialState)
        Report initial state.

      • reportTimestep

        void reportTimestep(Action action,
                    GameLoader game)
        Report intermediate nodes as they are being run. Useful for dense saving of data for TFRecords or other.
        Parameters:
        action -
        game -

      • reportGameEnding

        void reportGameEnding(Node endNode)
        Get the final game state for this run.

      • reportStageEnding

        void reportStageEnding(Node rootNode,
                       List<Node> targetNodes)
        Called when the end of a TreeStage is reached. TargetNodes meaning is different depending on the saver implementation.

      • setSaveInterval

        void setSaveInterval(int numGames)
        Set the number of games to collect in between saves.

      • setSavePath

        void setSavePath(String fileLoc)
        Set where the files are saved. Defaults to working directory otherwise.

      • getCopy

        IDataSaver getCopy()
        Get a fresh copy of this saver with the same settings.

      • generateFileName

        static String generateFileName(String prefix,
                               String className)
        Generate a filename. Format is: [prefix]_YYYY-MM-DD_HH-mm-ss.[class name]
